channel.title: Tech Layoffs on Lanturn Weekly
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Layoffs on Lanturn Weekly

item.title: Lanturn Glow - April 18, 2025
item.description: This glow ties flu shots, smoke alarms, and job leads to connection. Share a vaccination tip, pantry donation, or skill milestone to strengthen our web. Connection cuts loneliness—tell us your link to brighten the collective glow.

item.title: Lanturn Glow - April 17, 2025
item.description: Facing tech layoffs? This glow uses mindfulness to steady your path. Start a free coding course or share a job lead, grounded by a calming breath exercise. Mindful steps build opportunity—post your progress to lift others.

This week's digest tackles a global flu spike, an Ohio factory fire, and tech layoffs. We uncover shared stakes—health, safety, opportunity—and offer actionable steps like getting vaccinated, testing smoke alarms, and upskilling. Join us to build a stronger tomorrow, together.
